title: 命令方块生成的箭打中玩家后游戏闪退
author: Yihc
txt_content:
我用命令方块生成了一只飞出去的箭，这只箭击中玩家之后，游戏客户端崩溃。（游戏版本1.7.10）/summon Arrow ~ ~1 ~ {Motion:[-1.5,0.5,0.0]}复制代码


然后崩溃记录是：

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Why is it breaking :(

Time: 19-1-14 下午12:42
Description: Ticking entity

java.lang.ClassCastException: net.minecraft.entity.projectile.EntityArrow cannot be cast to net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase
